'''''Realm of Tranquil Eternity''''' is the first [[Inazuma]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album.

It features a total of 62 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The album is divided by three discs: ''Sakura and Violet Thunder'', ''Stories of the Floating World'', and ''Battles of Inazuma''.

The tracklist was announced on September 17, 2021, and the album was later released on September 22.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/571290672536325201 {{zh|「《原神》稻妻篇OST即将于9月22日上线 」}}]</ref><ref name="cn_hoyolab">miHoYo BBS: [https://bbs.mihoyo.com/ys/article/9624447 {{zh|「《原神》稻妻篇OST即将于9月22日上线 」}}]</ref>
